Description:
Detects changes in Sysmon driver altitude value.
If the Sysmon driver is configured to load at an altitude of another registered service, it will fail to load at boot.


Author: B.Talebi
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Sysmon Driver Altitude Change
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where target_object like '%\services\%' and target_object like '%\instances\sysmon instance\altitude'
